title: YOUR HONOR Ending Explained! Will There Be A Season 2?
author: Think Story
comment: I would never be together with the sister of the guy I killed, especially when you have a nice girlfriend from before. Adam was a weird character
In season 2, Jimmy and Michael buy an RV and go into the meth business together.
The money from Adams baseball bought the gun that killed him
I still wonder who was in the black SUV when Adam killed the kid driving and when he went back to take photos. Did I missed something, or was it never revealed? This person was a key witness.
Adam had that face that you just wanted to slap after you got to know him.
description:
We take a deep dive into Showtime's "Your Honor" starring Bryan Cranston to analyze its ending, discuss a potential season 2, and some of the things you may have missed along the way!
